tool_description: Performs system recovery operations including startup repair, system file repair, registry fixes, and boot configuration repair without full OS reinstallation.

recovery_type.description: Type of recovery operation: startup_repair, system_file_check, registry_repair, boot_repair, or comprehensive

backup_before_repair.description: Whether to create system backup before recovery operations

error_messages: Invalid recovery type: Use one of [startup_repair, system_file_check, registry_repair, boot_repair, comprehensive].
Recovery operation failed: Unable to complete the specified recovery operation.
System backup creation failed: Could not create backup before recovery operations.
Insufficient permissions: Run with administrator privileges for system recovery operations.
usage: Choose recovery_type based on symptoms (startup_repair for boot issues, system_file_check for corruption, comprehensive for multiple problems). Enable backup_before_repair for safety.

recovery_successful.description: Whether the recovery operation completed successfully

issues_found.description: Number of system issues detected during recovery

recovery_log.description: Detailed log of recovery operations performed

system_status.description: Overall system health status after recovery
